TopicTitle: Drunken Rockery: Tiny Shots (Stream Starts @ 8 PM EST)

Articles.Content:
I'm back with the drunken rocketry experiment for about 2 hours tonight starting 8PM EST. Restarted with a full goal of getting to the mun. After getting into orbit and sending up a space station I think we are well along to thoroughly testing the effects of alcohol on space exploration. So come by, listen to some classical music, and watch me try (and probably fail) at space.

Drunken Rockery: Tiny Shots
